DataRetrieval¶

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getArousal(wd)¶

Return the arousal of a word, or None if it doesn’t appear in the sentiment dictionary

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getDocumentData(startDate, endDate)¶

Returns a list of Document_Data objects falling within the date range (inclusive)

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getDocumentDataWithWordFilter(startDate, endDate, wordList)¶

Returns a list of Document_Data objects falling within the date range (inclusive), and only those that contain all the words in the given list of words

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getDocuments(startDate, endDate)¶

Returns a list of documents falling within the date range (inclusive) as nested lists of words, where each nested list is a separate document

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getNumWordInCorpus(documents, inputWord)¶

Returns the number of occurences of a given word in a list of Document_Data objects

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getNumWordsInCorpus(documents)¶

Returns the number of words in a list of Document_Data objects

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getValence(wd)¶

Return the valence of a word, or None if it doesn’t appear in the sentiment dictionary

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getWordData(wordIn)¶

Returns a list of Word_Data objects for a word

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.getWordsInDocument(doc)¶

Returns a list of the words in a document, repeats included

WordsOverTime.words.dataretrieval.splitDocuments(documents, granularity)¶

Splits a list of Document_Data objects into time bins specified by the granularity Granularity can be ‘Year’, ‘Month’, or ‘Week’ Returns a dictionary mapping lists of documents to their time bins
